tips.title: The Two-Minute Rule
tips.tip:
**If it takes less than two minutes, do it now.**

Examples:
- *"Reply to that quick email"*
- *"File that document"*
- *"Schedule that meeting"*

Small tasks pile up fast. Clear them immediately to keep your mental space free.

tips.title: Time Block Your Deep Work
tips.tip:
**Protect 2-4 hour blocks for focused work.**

Best practices:
- *"No meetings before 11am"*
- *"Turn off all notifications"*
- *"Close email and Slack"*

Your best work happens in uninterrupted stretches.

tips.title: Batch Similar Tasks
tips.tip:
**Group similar activities together.**

Examples:
- *"Answer all emails in one session"*
- *"Make all your calls back-to-back"*
- *"Review all PRs at once"*

Context switching kills productivity. Batching saves mental energy.

tips.title: Use the Pomodoro Technique
tips.tip:
**Work in 25-minute focused sprints.**

The cycle:
- *"25 minutes of focused work"*
- *"5 minute break"*
- *"Repeat 4 times, then take 15-30 minutes"*

Short bursts maintain high energy and focus.

tips.title: Start With Your Hardest Task
tips.tip:
**Tackle your most challenging work first thing.**

Why it works:
- *"Your willpower is highest in the morning"*
- *"Everything else feels easier after"*
- *"You avoid procrastination anxiety"*

Eat the frog first.

tips.title: Keep a 'Done' List
tips.tip:
**Track what you've accomplished, not just what's left.**

Benefits:
- *"Builds momentum and motivation"*
- *"Provides evidence of progress"*
- *"Great for performance reviews"*

Celebrate your wins, no matter how small.

tips.title: The 80/20 Rule
tips.tip:
**Focus on the 20% of work that creates 80% of results.**

Ask yourself:
- *"What will have the biggest impact?"*
- *"What can only I do?"*
- *"What moves the needle most?"*

Not all tasks are created equal.

tips.title: Set Implementation Intentions
tips.tip:
**Use 'if-then' planning for habits.**

Format:
- *"If it's 9am, then I'll start my deep work block"*
- *"If I finish a task, then I'll take a 5-minute break"*
- *"If I get stuck, then I'll ask for help within 30 minutes"*

Specific triggers create automatic behaviors.

tips.title: Limit Work In Progress
tips.tip:
**Finish what you start before starting something new.**

Rule of thumb:
- *"Maximum 3 active projects"*
- *"One primary focus per day"*
- *"Complete before you accumulate"*

Multitasking is a myth. Serial focus wins.

tips.title: Take Real Breaks
tips.tip:
**Step away from your screen completely.**

Effective breaks:
- *"Walk outside for 10 minutes"*
- *"Stretch or do light exercise"*
- *"Chat with a colleague face-to-face"*

Scrolling social media isn't a break. Your brain needs actual rest.
